XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 396.
_description: Love lyric — one quatrain, or two couplets

BLRoy8Cxii.Transcription:
ffayrnes and yong blood mony folke and muche goodffor dothe ofte that
                    þow ne kan know what thyng þat ys
BLRoy8Cxii.Note: Written by the hand of John Bristow.
BLRoy8Cxii.Editions:
Warner,  Sir George Frederic,  and  Julius P. Gilson, eds.  
             Catalogue of Western Manuscripts in the old Royal and King’s
                Collections.
         4 vols. London: Trustees of the British Museum, 1921: 1.238.
